page.title: 03THE LOCKWOOD AREA
page.content:
This area less than eight years ago was the heart of the{Yorkshire textile area. Sadly this industry has now declined, due mainly to worldwide competition & general recession.
The once thriving{woollen textile {industry}attracted many{Asian families into the area where they settled in the relatively low cost housing. The mainly{Moslem & Sikh}members of the community are law abiding{peaceful & {religious}by nature.
Family life and ties are important to them.The children of these families attend the local{Mosques}or the{Sikh {temple}at{Spring Grove}often for several hours after school. These children are generally warm, open, friendly and generous.
